“She’s Done It, Baby!”
======================

> First American woman in 33 years to win the Boston Marathon.

[Watch Now](https://www.youtube.com/embed/Em05ryjKyrI?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&rel=0)

card_2.cardText:
Desiree (Desi) Linden
---------------------

*   Won inA **2 hrs 39 mins 54 secs** through freezing temps & rain.
*   **6th attempt** at Boston Marathon.
*   **2-time Olympian** (London & Rio).
*   Self-described “bourbon geek.”
*   Lives in Michigan where she, her husband (a triathlete) & 2 other runners, own Linden & True coffee biz.

FLIP: Why she almost dropped out mid-race

card_3.cardText:
Sportswomanship Pays Off
------------------------

> A Linden won it all despite slowing down to wait for her running mate to take a potty break.
> 
> **_“Honestly at mile 2, 3, 4, I didnat feel like I was gonna even make it to the finish line. …_**_**When you work together, you never know whatas goingA to happen.”**  
> _Desi Linden to NBC Sports

card_4.cardText:
Marathon Moments
----------------

Japan’s **Yuki Kawauchi** won the men’s marathonA in 2:15:58, the country’s 1st race winner since 1987.

**Loren Zitomersky (aka Backwards Guy**) didn’t break the world record, but did raise $65K+ to end epilepsy.

**5 years ago**A terrorists killed 3 people & wounded hundreds by detonating bombs along race route.
